document.full_text: miguel cabrera's bases-loaded single in the bottom of the ninth gave the detroit tigers a 5-4 win over the texas rangers on tuesday.
document.title: cabrera's ninth-inning hit gives tigers 5-4 win over rangers
lines_and_colors: miguel cabrera's bases-loaded single in the bottom of the ninth gave the detroit tigers a 5-4 win over the texas rangers on tuesday.
